cast.overview: Joe Gideon is at the top of the heap, one of the most successful directors and choreographers in musical theater. But he can feel his world slowly collapsing around him - his obsession with work has almost destroyed his personal life, and only his bottles of pills keep him going.
cast.title: All That Jazz

cast.overview: After a tragic event happens, composer John Russell moves to Seattle to try to overcome it and build a new and peaceful life in a lonely big house that has been uninhabited for many years. But, soon after, the obscure history of such an old mansion and his own past begin to haunt him.
cast.title: The Changeling

details.biography: Sammy Smith was born on 3 March 1904. He was an actor, known for The In-Laws (1979), How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying (1967) and The Changeling (1980). He died on 23 April 1997 in Maywood, New Jersey, USA.
details.name: Sammy Smith
